items.title: ace
items.description:
"There is no chasm too wide, no wall too thick, that will stop me from bringing you home. 
 — Ace"

items.title: bandit
items.description:
"I used to be undercover. I did time. I had to deal drugs. I even had to kill. And I was so good at it that, it got me a promotion."
— Bandit

items.title: mira
items.description:
"Think of me as your conscience. I see everything, and I'm just as ruthless."
— Mira

items.title: blackbeard
items.description:
"I'm a diver. We're used to seeing threats through a layer of tempered glass."
— Blackbeard

items.title: warden
items.description:
"I was trapped, for a long time. Lived and seen things, you couldn't imagine. Now I see things... in a different light."
— Warden

items.title: caveira
items.description:
"Not every child gets to choose who they grow up to be."
— Caveira
